Soldier ants are wingless, sterile females that guard the colony and supply it with food, thus acting as both (i) _________ and laborers as the (ii) _________ queen produces enough (iii) _________ to continually populate the colony.
Blank (i)
Blank (ii)
Blank (iii)
(A) sentries
(D) fecund
(G) forebears
(B) sages
(E) efficacious
(H) progeny
(C) sycophants
(F) imperious
(I) harbingers
